title: balance
description: Returns token balances for this node's wallet.

token.description: Token display name (e.g., 'Minima' for native token)

confirmed.description: Full wallet balance including locked coins. Use as 'full balance'.

unconfirmed.description: Received but pending confirmation. Use as 'pending'.

sendable.description: Available to spend right now (confirmed minus locked). USE AS PRIMARY BALANCE.

coins.description: Number of UTXO coins held for this token.

total.description: AGENT WARNING: This is the TOKEN MAX SUPPLY / HARDCAP, NOT wallet balance. ~1B for Minima. NEVER display as balance.

x-agent-warnings: total is token max supply, NOT wallet balance
